alert.note: Alert for Bates (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 03 at 9:16AM CDT until June 05 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kansas...Missouri... Marais Des Cygnes River near Trading Post affecting Bates and Linn KS Counties. Marais Des Cygnes River at La Cygne affecting Linn KS County. This product along with additional weather and stream information is available at www.weather.gov/kc/. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Marais Des Cygnes River near Trading Post. * WHEN...Until early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 27.0 feet, Flooding of low-lying farmland occurs and water begins to approach Stateline Road north of the river gauge. At 29.0 feet, Stateline Road is flooded north of the river gauge. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:01 AM CDT Friday the stage was 27.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Obs Forecasts Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun 1pm 1pm 1pm Marais Des Cygnes River Trading Post 27.0 27.9 Fri 9am 27.8 25.2 17.3 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
